FuncDef: The display isis lsdb history command displays information about a backup LSDB. The display isis lsdb history command displays information about a backup LSDB.
CLIs: display isis [ <process-id> ] lsdb [ { level-1 | level-2 } | verbose [ no-name ] ] history <history-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays information about a backup Level-1 LSDB.
-

Displays information about a backup Level-2 LSDB.
If no level is specified, information about Level-1 and Level-2 LSDBs is displayed.
-

Displays detailed information about a backup LSDB.
-

Displays detailed information about the LSDB, without the alias information.
-

Specifies the number of times an LSDB is backed up.
The value is 1 or 2.
